Logger

  • var log = new Logger();
  • log.info(Hey, here’s some ‘info’, the number 2 is equal to:", 2) Hey, here’s some ‘info’, the number 2 is equal to: 2
  • log.pass("Great Job! You ‘pass’!") Great Job! You ‘pass’!
  • log.warn("Watch yourself. I will only ‘warn’ you once...") Watch yourself. I will only ‘warn’ you once...
  • log.fail("Woah! Total ‘fail’! This is totally not what you were looking for.") Woah! Total ‘fail’! This is totally not what you were looking for.
  • log.go("Let’s just ‘go’ with something a bit more basic.") Let’s just ‘go’ with something a bit more basic.
  • log.go("Check the inspector, foo.") Check the inspector, foo.
